  (!*((miTag*)((char*)(p)+(s)->shader->ghost_offs)) ? (void*)(p) : \
  mi_phen_eval(s,(void*)(p))))

#define MI_OUTSTATE_VERSION   2
 

#define MI_SQRT   sqrt
 

#define MI_STATE_VERSION   2
 

#define mi_vector_add (  r,
a,
b   ) 
 

Value:

((r)->x = (a)->x + (b)->x,\
                                 (r)->y = (a)->y + (b)->y,\
                                 (r)->z = (a)->z + (b)->z)

#define mi_vector_det (  a,
b,
c   ) 
 

Value:

((a)->x * ((b)->y * (c)->z - (c)->y * (b)->z)+\
                                 (b)->x * ((c)->y * (a)->z - (a)->y * (c)->z)+\
                                 (c)->x * ((a)->y * (b)->z - (b)->y * (a)->z))

#define mi_vector_dist (  a,
b   ) 
 

Value:

MI_SQRT(((a)->x - (b)->x) * ((a)->x - (b)->x)+\
                                        ((a)->y - (b)->y) * ((a)->y - (b)->y)+\
                                        ((a)->z - (b)->z) * ((a)->z - (b)->z))

#define mi_vector_div (  r,
d   ) 
 

Value:

do {if ((d) != 0.0f)\
                                        {register miScalar _i=1.0f/(d);\
                                                 (r)->x *= _i;\
                                                 (r)->y *= _i;\
                                                 (r)->z *= _i; }} while (0)

#define mi_vector_div_d (  r,
d   ) 
 

Value:

do {if ((d) != 0.0)\
                                        {register double _i = 1.0/(d);\
                                                 (r)->x *= _i;\
                                                 (r)->y *= _i;\
                                                 (r)->z *= _i; }} while (0)

#define mi_vector_dot (  a,
b   ) 
 

Value:

((a)->x * (b)->x +\
                                 (a)->y * (b)->y +\
                                 (a)->z * (b)->z)

#define mi_vector_dot_d (  a,
b   ) 
 

Value:

((double)(a)->x * (double)(b)->x +\
                                 (double)(a)->y * (double)(b)->y +\
                                 (double)(a)->z * (double)(b)->z)

#define mi_vector_max (  r,
a,
b   ) 
 

Value:

((a)->x > (b)->x ? ((r)->x = (a)->x) \
                                                 : ((r)->x = (b)->x),\
                                 (a)->y > (b)->y ? ((r)->y = (a)->y) \
                                                 : ((r)->y = (b)->y),\
                                 (a)->z > (b)->z ? ((r)->z = (a)->z) \
                                                 : ((r)->z = (b)->z))

#define mi_vector_min (  r,
a,
b   ) 
 

Value:

((a)->x < (b)->x ? ((r)->x = (a)->x) \
                                                 : ((r)->x = (b)->x),\
                                 (a)->y < (b)->y ? ((r)->y = (a)->y) \
                                                 : ((r)->y = (b)->y),\
                                 (a)->z < (b)->z ? ((r)->z = (a)->z) \
                                                 : ((r)->z = (b)->z))

#define mi_vector_mul (  r,
f   ) 
 

Value:

((r)->x *= (f),\
                                 (r)->y *= (f),\
                                 (r)->z *= (f))

#define mi_vector_neg (  r   ) 
 

Value:

((r)->x = -(r)->x,\
                                 (r)->y = -(r)->y,\
                                 (r)->z = -(r)->z)

#define mi_vector_norm (  r   ) 
 

Value:

(miScalar)MI_SQRT((r)->x * (r)->x +\
                                        (r)->y * (r)->y +\
                                        (r)->z * (r)->z)

#define mi_vector_norm_d (  r   ) 
 

Value:

sqrt((double)(r)->x * (double)(r)->x +\
                                     (double)(r)->y * (double)(r)->y +\
                                     (double)(r)->z * (double)(r)->z)

#define mi_vector_normalize (  r   ) 
 

Value:

do { register miScalar _n = mi_vector_norm(r);\
                                     mi_vector_div(r, _n); } while (0)

#define mi_vector_normalize_d (  r   ) 
 

Value:

do { register double _n= mi_vector_norm_d(r);\
                                     mi_vector_div_d(r, _n); } while (0)

#define mi_vector_prod (  r,
a,
b   ) 
 

Value:

((r)->x = (a)->y * (b)->z - (a)->z * (b)->y,\
                                 (r)->y = (a)->z * (b)->x - (a)->x * (b)->z,\
                                 (r)->z = (a)->x * (b)->y - (a)->y * (b)->x)

#define mi_vector_sub (  r,
a,
b   ) 
 

Value:

((r)->x = (a)->x - (b)->x,\
                                 (r)->y = (a)->y - (b)->y,\
                                 (r)->z = (a)->z - (b)->z)

#define miAPPROX_DEFAULT (  A   ) 
 

Value:

do {             \
        (A).style         = miAPPROX_STYLE_TREE; \
        (A).method        = miAPPROX_PARAMETRIC; \
        (A).sharp         = 0;                   \
        (A).flag          = miAPPROX_FLAG_ANY;   \
        (A).any           = miFALSE;             \
        (A).view_dep      = miFALSE;             \
        (A).cnst[0]       = 0.0;                 \
        (A).cnst[1]       = 0.0;                 \
        (A).cnst[2]       = 0.0;                 \
        (A).cnst[3]       = 0.0;                 \
        (A).cnst[4]       = 0.0;                 \
        (A).cnst[5]       = 0.0;                 \
        (A).subdiv[miMIN] = 0;                   \
        (A).subdiv[miMAX] = 5;                   \
        (A).max           = miHUGE_INT;          \
        (A).grading       = 0.0; } while (0)

#define miAPPROX_FINE_DEFAULT (  A   ) 
 

Value:

do {             \
        (A).style         = miAPPROX_STYLE_FINE; \
        (A).method        = miAPPROX_LDA;        \
        (A).sharp         = 0;                   \
        (A).flag          = (1<<miCNST_NTYPES)-1;\
        (A).any           = miFALSE;             \
        (A).view_dep      = miTRUE;              \
        (A).cnst[0]       = 0.25;                \
        (A).cnst[1]       = 0.0;                 \
        (A).cnst[2]       = 0.0;                 \
        (A).cnst[3]       = 0.0;                 \
        (A).cnst[4]       = 0.0;                 \
        (A).cnst[5]       = 0.0;                 \
        (A).subdiv[miMIN] = 0;                   \
        (A).subdiv[miMAX] = miAPPROX_MAX_SUBDIV; \
        (A).max           = miHUGE_INT;          \
        (A).grading       = 0.0; } while (0)

#define miAPPROX_MAX_SUBDIV   7
 

#define miAPPROX_NONE (  A   )     memset(&(A), 0, sizeof(miApprox))

#define miRAY_PHOTON (  r   ) 
 

Value:

(((r) >= miPHOTON_ABSORB &&\
                                 (r) <= miPHOTON_TRANSMIT_DIFFUSE) ||\
                                 ((r) >= miPHOTON_SCATTER_VOLUME &&\
                                  (r) <= miPHOTON_TRANSPARENT) ||\
                                  (r) >= miPHOTON_EMIT_GLOBILLUM &&\
                                  (r) <= miPHOTON_EMIT_CAUSTIC)

#define miRAY_SECONDARY (  r   )

((r) >  miRAY_EYE &&\
                                 (r) <  miPHOTON_ABSORB ||\
                                 (r) == miRAY_FINALGATHER)
